description:
A fight between his sisters ends up leading to Kyosuke thinking about his relationships with Madoka and Hikaru, while they both consider the same.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Madoka no Kesshin! Sankaku Kankei ni Period
Madoka è risoluta! Un basta al triangolo
Madoka`s Ultimate Decision! Putting a Period to the Love Triangle
まどかの決心!三角関係にピリオド
